item_prototype.name: Health status of disk "{#SLOT_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}"
item_prototype.description: online - which indicates that the drive is available through all drive ports degraded - which indicates that the drive is available but not through all drive ports offline - which indicates that the drive is unavailable

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Hard disk {#SLOT_ID} in enclosure {#ENCLOSURE_ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Fault LED of enclosure ID - "{#ID}", Serial Number - "{#SERIAL_NUMBER}"
Health status of enclosure ID - "{#ID}", Serial Number - "{#SERIAL_NUMBER}"

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Enclosure ID - "{#ID}", Serial Number - "{#SERIAL_NUMBER}" health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
{HOST.NAME} -> Enclosure ID - "{#ID}", Serial Number - "{#SERIAL_NUMBER}" LED status is failed
trigger_prototype.description:
Indicates the status of the fault light-emitting diode (LED) on the enclosure:
on - if a service action is required immediately on the enclosure or a component within the enclosure (including a canister, power unit, or non-spared drive). slow_flashing - if there is insufficient battery power to run I/O off - if there are not faults on the enclosure or its components

item_prototype.name: Health status of BBU "{#BATTERY_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}"

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> BBU "{#BATTERY_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}" health status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Health status of Canister "{#CANISTER_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}"

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Canister "{#CANISTER_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}" health status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Fan of PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}"
Health status of PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}"
Input Power of PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}"
Output Power of PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}"

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}" fan status is failed
{HOST.NAME} -> PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}" health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
{HOST.NAME} -> PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}" input power status is failed
{HOST.NAME} -> PSU "{#PSU_ID}" in enclosure "{#ENCLOSURE_ID}" output power status is failed

discovery_rule.name: Mdisk
discovery_rule.description: Display a concise list or a detailed view of managed disks (MDisks). RAID-массивы показывает

item_prototype.name: Health status of Mdisk "{#NAME}"
Free capacity of a Pool "{#NAME}"
Health status of a Pool "{#NAME}"
Percent overallocation on Pool "{#NAME}"
Real capacity of a Pool "{#NAME}"
Total capacity of a Pool "{#NAME}"
Used capacity of a Pool "{#NAME}"
Virtual capacity of a Pool "{#NAME}"
Running status of Fibre Channel port ID - "{#PORT_ID}", node name - "{#NODE_NAME}"

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} - > PortFibreChannel ID - "{#PORT_ID}", node name - "{#NODE_NAME}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Indicates whether the port is configured to a device of Fibre Channel (FC) port. The values are: active inactive_configured inactive_unconfigured

item_prototype.name: Running status of SAS port ID - "{#PORT_ID}", node name - "{#NODE_NAME}"

trigger_prototype.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template IBM-Storwize-3700 CLI v2:running.lsportsas.[{#PORT_ID}.{#NODE_NAME}].last()}<>0 and {Template IBM-Storwize-3700 CLI v2:running.lsportsas.[{#PORT_ID}.{#NODE_NAME}].change()}=1) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template IBM-Storwize-3700 CLI v2:is_there_expansion_enclosure.last()}<>0)
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} -> PortSas ID - "{#PORT_ID}", node name - "{#NODE_NAME}" running status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description:
Indicates the status of the port (numeric string). The values can be:
online - if the port is functioning offline - if the port is not functioning offline_unconfigured - if not functioning but not configured by the user degraded - if one or more ports are not functioning or have a lower speed than others excluded - if excluded by the user or system
Если на сторвайзе нет полок-расширения, то SAS-порты на контроллере будут оффлайн

item_prototype.name: Health status of Volume "{#NAME}"

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Error getting metrics from storage device
{HOST.NAME} -> Error processing metrics on zabbix
trigger.description: Кол-во значений равных 2 и полученных за последний час больше или равно 35

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} -> Error sending metrics to zabbix
trigger.description: Кол-во значений равных 1 и полученных за последний час больше или равно 35

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} -> No data from storage device for 1 hour
